trans-unit.resname: ACR·20 | Leonardo da Vinci | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}{U}{U}: Until end of turn, Thopters you control have base power and toughness X/X, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
trans-unit.target: {3}{U}{U}: Until end of turn, Thopters you control have base power and toughness X/X, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

trans-unit.resname: ACR·20 | Leonardo da Vinci | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. If the discarded card was an artifact card, exile it from your graveyard. If you do, create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 0/2 Thopter artifact creature with flying in addition to its other types.
trans-unit.target: {2}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. If the discarded card was an artifact card, exile it from your graveyard. If you do, create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 0/2 Thopter artifact creature with flying in addition to its other types.

trans-unit.source: Assassin spells you cast have freerunning {B}{B}. (You may cast a spell for its freerunning cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with an Assassin or commander.)
trans-unit.target: Assassin spells you cast have freerunning {B}{B}. (You may cast a spell for its freerunning cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with an Assassin or commander.)

trans-unit.resname: ACR·25 | Ezio Auditore da Firenze | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever Ezio deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} if that player has 10 or less life. When you do, that player loses the game.
trans-unit.target: Whenever Ezio deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} if that player has 10 or less life. When you do, that player loses the game.

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, exile up to one target Assassin creature card from your graveyard with a memory counter on it. Then for each creature card you own in exile with a memory counter on it, create a tapped and attacking token that's a copy of it. Exile those tokens at end of combat.
trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, exile up to one target Assassin creature card from your graveyard with a memory counter on it.
